content.question: Which of the following best explains the significance of the sign in the image?

choices.label: It reinforces efforts of African Americans to boycott businesses practicing discrimination after Emancipation.
It highlights the designation of African Americans as second-class citizens after Reconstruction.
It ties the automobile in the background to the formal clothes worn by the people in the image.
It represents the combination of liberation and dignity enjoyed by African Americans in the United States.

content.answer: It highlights the designation of African Americans as second-class citizens after Reconstruction.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
